summary: AN ORDINANCE amending Seattle Municipal Code Title 4 by adding a new Chapter, Seattle Municipal Code 4.26 relating to family and medical leave; establishing provisions for eligible city employees to take reasonable unpaid leave to take care of a newborn or newly adopted child, to take care of a sick child, spouse/domestic partner, or parent, or to take care of an employee's own serious health condition; and to comply with state and federal law.
